contextId.occurrenceNote: "For you have left your people" and do not care what happens to them. Here the word "you" refers to Yahweh and so is singular. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-pronouns]])
contextId.glQuote: For you have abandoned your people

contextId.occurrenceNote: Yahweh speaks of himself as if he were someone else to remind the people of who he is. Alternate translation: "therefore I, the Lord, am" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-pronouns]])
